description: ‚ö° Kepler Power Consumption Dashboard - Monitor energy consumption across nodes, processes, containers, pods and vm with real-time power metrics

panels.description: Overview of dashboard sections and configuration requirements

options.content:
# üìä Kepler Power Consumption Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive power consumption monitoring across different levels:

## üìã Dashboard Sections:
- **üåê Cluster Wide Consumption**: Real-time power consumption aggregated by zone with current, active, and idle power
- **üñ•Ô∏è Node Info**: Hardware information including CPU models and core counts
- **üìä RAPL Info**: Running Average Power Limit zones available on the node
- **‚ö° Node Consumption**: Individual node power usage trends with zone-based breakdown for total, active, and idle consumption
- **üîß Process Consumption**: Process-level power with zone-based aggregation and time series tracking
- **üì¶ Container Consumption**: Container-level power showing top consumers and detailed power usage patterns
- **üöÄ Pod Consumption**: Kubernetes pod power usage with namespace-level analysis and individual pod tracking

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Configuration:
- **Pod section** will be empty by default - requires Kepler configuration with kubeconfig access to your Kubernetes cluster
- **VM section** will be empty by default - provision VMs on the monitored host
- **RAPL zones** availability depends on hardware support (Intel processors with RAPL capabilities)
- Use the template variables (Node, Zone, Namespace, Pod, Process, Container) to filter and focus on specific components
- Refer to the documentation for detailed setup and configuration instructions

panels.title: üìã Dashboard Overview

panels.description: Displays the real-time total power consumption aggregated by zone. This provides an overview of current energy usage across different hardware zones.
panels.title: ‚ö° Current Power Consumption By Zone

panels.description: Shows the active power consumption by zone - power consumed during processing and computational tasks. This represents energy used for actual workload execution.
panels.title: üî• Current Active Power Consumption By Zone

panels.description: Displays the idle power consumption by zone - baseline power used when systems are not actively processing.
panels.title: üí§ Current Idle Power Consumption By Zone

panels.description: Displays detailed CPU information for each node including model names and core counts.
panels.title: üíª CPU Info

panels.description: Shows Running Average Power Limit (RAPL) zones available on each node.
panels.title: üìä RAPL Info

panels.description: Time series chart showing total power consumption trends aggregated by zone over time.
panels.title: üîã Total Power Consumption (W) per Zone

panels.description: Individual node power consumption breakdown by zone and instance.
panels.title: üñ•Ô∏è Node Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Node-level active power consumption showing energy used during computational tasks.
panels.title: üî• Node Active Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Node-level idle power consumption representing baseline energy usage when nodes are not actively processing.
panels.title: üí§ Node Idle Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Table showing the top 10 most power-hungry processes across all zones.
panels.title: üèÜ Top 10 Power Consuming Processes (W) per Zone

panels.description: Aggregated time series showing total power consumption of all processes per zone.
panels.title: üîã Total Power Consumption of Processes (W) per Zone

panels.description: Detailed power consumption tracking for a specific selected process. Use the Process variable to monitor individual process energy usage patterns.
panels.title: üîß Process Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Table displaying the top 10 containers with highest power consumption per zone.
panels.title: üèÜ Top 10 Power Consuming Containers (W) per Zone

panels.description: Time series showing total container power consumption trends aggregated by zone.
panels.title: üîã Total Power Consumption of Containers (W) per Zone

panels.description: Individual container power consumption tracking by zone. Use the Container variable to monitor specific container energy usage patterns and performance.
panels.title: üì¶ Container Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Table showing the top 10 Kubernetes namespaces with highest power consumption per zone.
panels.title: üèÜ Top 10 Power Consuming Namespaces (W) per Zone

panels.description: Time series chart showing total power consumption of pods within selected namespaces by zone.
panels.title: üîã Total Power Consumption of Pods in Namespace (W) per Zone

panels.description: Individual pod power consumption tracking by zone and namespace. Use the Pod variable to monitor specific pod energy usage and performance characteristics.
panels.title: üöÄ Pod Power Consumption (W) By Zone

panels.description: Table showing the top 10 Virtual Machines with highest power consumption per zone.
panels.title: üèÜ Top 10 Power Consuming VMs (W) per Zone

panels.description: Time series chart showing total power consumption of VMs by zone.
panels.title: üîã Total Power Consumption of VMs (W) per Zone

panels.description: Individual VM power consumption tracking by zone. Use the VM variable to monitor specific virtual machine energy usage and performance characteristics.
panels.title: üñ•Ô∏è VM Power Consumption (W) By Zone
